## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Refactoring (no functional changes)
- [ ] CI/CD changes

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the code style of this project (`pnpm lint` passes)
- [ ] I have run `pnpm format` to apply Prettier formatting
- [ ] The build passes locally (`pnpm build`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] All existing tests still pass (`pnpm test`)
- [ ] I have updated the documentation where relevant
- [ ] I have checked for breaking changes and updated version numbers if necessary
- [ ] My commit messages follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) format
